languages.text: Блюститель: "Я... почти ничего не помню. Лишь яркую вспышку, пурпурное марево... Помню, как испугался до дрожи в коленях, как ноги двигались словно по чужой воле и несли меня прочь... Пока за спиной слышались крики. Лорд-капитан и Леди Кассия... Их... О, Бог-Император, твари затащили обоих в картину!"

traits.locale_text: Блюститель: Я... почти ничего не помню. Лишь яркую вспышку, пурпурное марево... Помню, как испугался до дрожи в коленях, как ноги двигались, словно по чужой воле, и несли меня прочь... Пока за спиной слышались крики. Лорд-капитан и Леди Кассия... Их... О, Бог-Император, твари затащили обоих в картину!

languages.text: Enforcer: "I... I barely remember a thing. There was a bright flash, a purple blur... I remember feeling so scared that my knees were shaking. I remember my legs carrying me away like they had a mind of their own... As I ran, I heard screams behind me... The Lord Captain and Lady Cassia... they... oh, God-Emperor, the creatures, they pulled them both inside the painting!"
languages.original_text: Блюститель: "Я... почти ничего не помню. Лишь яркую вспышку, пурпурное марево... О, Бог-Император, твари затащили обоих в картину!"

languages.text: エンフォーサー：「俺は…ひとつかろうじて覚えていることがある。まばゆい閃光、 紫のぼやけた物体…あまりの恐怖にひざが震えていた。この両脚は自由意志を持つかのように、俺をその場から遠ざけた…走っていると、背後から叫び声が聞こえた…ロード・キャプテンとレディ・カシア…ふたりは…ああ、神帝陛下よ、怪物が、ふたりを絵の中に引き込んでしまった！」
languages.original_text: Enforcer: "I... I barely remember a thing. There was a bright flash, a purple blur... I remember feeling so scared that my knees were shaking. I remember my legs carrying me away like they had a mind of their own... As I ran, I heard screams behind me... The Lord Captain and Lady Cassia... they... oh, God-Emperor, the creatures, they pulled them both inside the painting!"

traits.locale_text: エンフォーサー：「俺は…ひとつかろうじて覚えていることがある。まばゆい閃光、 紫のぼやけた物体…あまりの恐怖にひざが震えていた。この両脚は自由意志を持つかのように、俺をその場から遠ざけた…走っていると、背後から叫び声が聞こえた…ロード・キャプテンとレディ・カシア…ふたりは…ああ、神帝陛下よ、怪物が、ふたりを絵の中に引き込んでしまった！」

languages.text: 执法者：“后……后来的事情我基本记不清了。当时闪过一道亮光，出现了一片紫色的云雾……我记得我当时吓坏了。我的两条腿抖个不停，就像活过来一样，拉着我拼命逃跑……我跑着跑着，听到身后传来了尖叫声……领主舰长和卡西娅女士……噢……神皇保佑……那些怪物，把他们两个拉进了画里！”
languages.original_text: Enforcer: "I... I barely remember a thing. There was a bright flash, a purple blur... I remember feeling so scared that my knees were shaking. I remember my legs carrying me away like they had a mind of their own... As I ran, I heard screams behind me... The Lord Captain and Lady Cassia... they... oh, God-Emperor, the creatures, they pulled them both inside the painting!"

traits.locale_text: 执法者：“后……后来的事情我基本记不清了。当时闪过一道亮光，出现了一片紫色的云雾……我记得我当时吓坏了。我的两条腿抖个不停，就像活过来一样，拉着我拼命逃跑……我跑着跑着，听到身后传来了尖叫声……领主舰长和卡西娅女士……噢……神皇保佑……那些怪物，把他们两个拉进了画里！”

languages.text: Prévôt : « Je... je ne me souviens pas de grand-chose. Il y a eu un éclair de lumière pourpre aveuglante... Je me rappelle avoir eu tellement peur que je tremblais de tout mon être. Je me rappelle avoir pris la fuite, comme si mes jambes étaient dotées d'une volonté propre... Et je me rappelle avoir entendu hurler dans mon dos. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} et dame Cassia... {mf|Ils|Elles}... Oh, par l'Empereur-Dieu ! {mf|Ils|Elles} ont {mf|tous|toutes} les deux été {mf|entraînés|entraînées} dans le tableau par les créatures ! »
languages.original_text: Enforcer: "I... I barely remember a thing. There was a bright flash, a purple blur... I remember feeling so scared that my knees were shaking. I remember my legs carrying me away like they had a mind of their own... As I ran, I heard screams behind me... The Lord Captain and Lady Cassia... they... oh, God-Emperor, the creatures, they pulled them both inside the painting!"

Je me rappelle avoir eu tellement peur que je tremblais de tout mon être. Je me rappelle avoir pris la fuite, comme si mes jambes étaient dotées d'une volonté propre... Et je me rappelle avoir entendu hurler dans mon dos. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} et dame Cassia... {mf|Ils|Elles}... Oh, par l'Empereur-Dieu ! {mf|Ils|Elles} ont {mf|tous|toutes} les deux été {mf|entraînés|entraînées} dans le tableau par les créatures ! »

languages.text: Guardia: «Yo... apenas recuerdo nada. Se produjo un intenso fogonazo, un destello púrpura... Recuerdo sentir tanto miedo que me temblaban las piernas. Recuerdo que mis piernas me sacaron de allí como si tuviesen voluntad propia... Mientras corría, oí gritos a mis espaldas... {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán y lady Cassia... ellos... ¡oh, Dios Emperador, esas criaturas los agarraron y los arrastraron al interior del cuadro!».
languages.original_text: Enforcer: "I... I barely remember a thing. There was a bright flash, a purple blur... I remember feeling so scared that my knees were shaking. I remember my legs carrying me away like they had a mind of their own... As I ran, I heard screams behind me... The Lord Captain and Lady Cassia... they... oh, God-Emperor, the creatures, they pulled them both inside the painting!"

traits.locale_text: Guardia: «Yo... apenas recuerdo nada. Se produjo un intenso fogonazo, un destello púrpura... Recuerdo sentir tanto miedo que me temblaban las piernas. Recuerdo que mis piernas me sacaron de allí como si tuviesen voluntad propia... Mientras corría, oí gritos a mis espaldas... {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán y lady Cassia... ellos... ¡oh, Dios Emperador, esas criaturas los agarraron y los arrastraron al interior del cuadro!».

languages.text: Enforcer: "Ich ... Ich erinnere mich an kaum etwas. Es war einen hellen Blitz, einen violetten Nebel ... Ich weiß noch, dass mir vor Angst die Knie schlotterten. Ich weiß noch, dass meine Beine mich weggetragen haben, als hätten sie einen eigenen Willen ... Während ich gelaufen bin, habe ich hinter mir Schreie gehört ... Der Lord Captain und Lady Cassia ... sie ... oh, Gottimperator, die Kreaturen haben sie beide in das Gemälde hineingezogen!"
languages.original_text: Enforcer: "I... I barely remember a thing. There was a bright flash, a purple blur... I remember feeling so scared that my knees were shaking. I remember my legs carrying me away like they had a mind of their own... As I ran, I heard screams behind me... The Lord Captain and Lady Cassia... they... oh, God-Emperor, the creatures, they pulled them both inside the painting!"

languages.text: İnfazcı: "Zar zor hatırlıyorum. Parlak bir ışık, mor bir bulanıklık vardı... O kadar korkmuştum ki dizlerim titriyordu, bunu hatırlıyorum. Kendimi tutamayıp can havliyle kaçtığımı da hatırlıyorum. Kaçarken arkadan birilerinin çığlık attığını duydum. Lord Kaptan ile Leydi Cassia... Onlar... Tanrı İmparator, sen büyüksün. Yaratıklar, ikisini de tablonun içine çekti!"
languages.original_text: Enforcer: "I... I barely remember a thing. There was a bright flash, a purple blur... I remember feeling so scared that my knees were shaking. I remember my legs carrying me away like they had a mind of their own... As I ran, I heard screams behind me... The Lord Captain and Lady Cassia... they... oh, God-Emperor, the creatures, they pulled them both inside the painting!"

traits.locale_text: İnfazcı: "Zar zor hatırlıyorum. Parlak bir ışık ve mor renkli bir bulanıklık vardı... O kadar korkmuştum ki dizlerim titriyordu, bunu hatırlıyorum. Kendimi tutamayıp can havliyle kaçtığımı da hatırlıyorum... Kaçarken arkadan birilerinin çığlık attığını duydum... Lord Kaptan ve Leydi Cassia... Onlar... Tanrı İmparator, sen büyüksün... Yaratıklar, ikisini de tablonun içine çekti!"
